description: This place was a trip. But real cool. We went on a Sunday night so it was a low key and the bartender made it even better because he was a funny dude. Drinks weren't expensive. The design of the bar was awesome. Maybe a little less hetero porn would've been nice lol especially since it's SF but other than that an erotically artsy place and a good time was spent here with some friends.
author: Analise G.

description: I came in late at about 1am on a Saturday. It wasn't too packed but there was only a small walk space between the wall and the bar stools which made it hard to get in and order a drink. Even with just about 20 people at the bar. I've read a lot of reviews about the bouncers being racist against people of color. Well I was by myself and the bouncer was very sweet. Not to mention that he was a man of color himself. Take what people say on Yelp with a grain of salt. I was coming from out of town and wanted to just check it out and get some pictures. I have never been in a bar quite like this before. I wish I would have come in a group I would have loved to party here and hang out in one of the car booths and watch porn and get wasted hahaha! Next time!
author: Cassandra C.

description: Was accidentally brought here , I had bad experience with an ignorant (borderline gross) person who sat next to me but the bartender was trying his best to be nice. Oh woah all the porn items everywhere , I mean it's ok to have this as a genre but it made my skin crawl a bit.
author: Lulu Y.

description:
Fascinating...

Waterbeds to lounge in...
80s TV commercials with pornography spliced in...
Bar with pictures of nude ladies...
Booths with Jacuzzi seating...
And decor that I wouldn't call pro-feminists...

The crowd is typical 20s-30s San Franciscan hipsters...I wonder how they all afford to live here. The bachelor party and I were pretty drunk by the time we arrived, but I do remember that 2 Stellas, 2 tequila shots, and an Old Fashioned ran $38, which I don't think is too terrible for San Francisco.
author: Chun P.

description:
I really don't know why Kozy Kar has such a bad rep. This place is pretty fun to go with people that aren't uptight and know how to have a good time. It is super unique and has not changed with the passage of time. 
It has lots and lots of nudity in it and very unique seating areas, so if you have a problem with nudity then just stay away and don't ruin the fun for everyone else. 

The drink prices are super reasonable and the bartenders are pretty chill and attentive. It is a great space if you have a group with you. This wasn't the first time I've been there and I am pretty sure it won't be my last.
author: Stephanie A.

description:
The bouncer here was really rude when my friends and I came in the other night. He snatched my friends water bottle (which was empty) out of her hands because there's no outside liquids allowed and then grabbed two of my friends bags and threw them on the floor behind him since apparently there's no bags allowed either. My friend was taking her phone out of her pocket when he tried to grab that as well, asking if she was trying to sneak a flask in... I walked in right behind them as they turned to leave and asked for his name and if I could fill my water bottle. He didn't like that I asked for his name and said I couldn't fill my bottle or come inside and said there wasn't a manager on duty to speak with. 
He was probably acting like that because of bad experiences he's had in the past, but it was just a horrible experience and we left without ever getting past the doorway
author: Kulmeher D.

description:
Last Friday I went there and gave them our credit card to order drinks. The shit bartender returned a different card when we closed out our tab! Then told us we were drunk and we didn't have a card there. I messaged the person who card we ended up with and he said they told him "we lost your card" 
Those idiots who worked last Friday need to get fired!
author: Roxy L.

description:
Came from Toronto for my birthday. I was told to come to Polk St for the nightlife. Kozy Car looked like a popular place. Went inside took a seat at the bar.

Met some people from Kentucky (super nice people who even gave me a ride home, Shout out to Kristie and Andy lovely to meet you) and had a blast. A lot fun, cold drinks and good music.

Special thanks to Scott. Not only a really polite guy, but I lost my favourite hat and he found it! Scott really went the extra mile and provided excellent customer service. Service like that is definitely a reason why I would highly recommend coming to Kozy Car.
author: David L.

description:
This place is one of the most unique bars in SF, I'd say. From the water beds to the porn they show on the TVs, it's pretty interesting.

What's really great about this place is the drinks are pretty cheap! I paid $8 for an Old Fashioned. Makes for a great place to pre-game before heading out to the other bars in the area.

Overall, would definitely recommend you come and check it out!
author: James D.

description: I used to like this place, but the bartenders seem to be a-holes now.  I got a drink from this dude (see photo), and as soon as I get my change he says "is it not your custom to tip?  That's fucked up, I'm gonna throw your ass out."  Usually I tip on my way out, but yeah man, here's my $1 for all your help in popping the tab on that PBR and running your sweaty palm on the top of it for me.  Dude then walks around to every other bar tender and points at me.  There are about 10 other bars within a block so find somewhere with a respectable bartender who won't threaten you.  Try lush lounge on Polk, 3 blocks down.
author: Alex G.

description:
Fun spot! Good drinks and a nice bar to hang out. Can get a bit loud at times but what bar doesn't.
Soft core porn on the tv's at times, really adds some exciting flavor. Very SF.
author: Will W.

description:
Maybe one of the best bars I have ever been to . Should be called Krazy Kars if you ask me. A van with a water beds ( seems like a 1970s  sex van if you catch my drift) Other notables are a dancing pole and some crazy ass TVs with 70s porn that cuts from porn to   70s commercials with much innuendo, playing an endless loop.  Drinks are cheap and the service is friendly and efficient. 

This a unique, hilarious, very original
 San Francisco gem that is a must see but not for the faint of heart.
author: Jeff B.

description: This is by far the most hilarious bar I've ever been to in SF! The decor alone will leave you amazed and entertained for hours. You could go alone or bring a friend and enjoy the shenanigans this place has to offer. From chillaxin in the waterbed, to sitting in an empty hot tub as your table, to watching the TV's "entertainment." Someone took me here as an official initiation into SF culture and I was shocked and pleased with the "anything goes" mentality! This place is worth the visit, you are guaranteed a laugh... especially if you go to enjoy a drink AND people watch! You feel like you're in an episode of candid camera.If you have a twisted sense of humor...check this place out for sure! Went for a trivia night with pizza once and that was fun too!
author: Tatiana V.

description: Was targeted by doorman. Went in to check it out for the first time, and spent maybe 10 minutes in the bar - there was no seating and we decided to leave and upon exiting, the doorman stopped us and said, "Next time don't come in the bar and waste space." So, you're saying if you go in to a department store you're required to buy? What happened to just being able to window shop. Drove from the East Bay to check out this space, only to be sorely disappointed. Will not be returning.
author: Alicia E.

description:
Definitely not what I was expecting before I walked in, but I had a great time anyway! The decorations were eyebrow raising, but I did enjoy the waterbed. Took us a while to realize that they werent just playing regular movies on the screens, that pretty much every minute or so it cuts into 5 seconds of porn scenes that got increasingly hardcore as the night progresses. 

I can see this being a fun dive bar with some friends, but probably not the best bar to hang out with your coworkers (unless they're cool, of course), or for a first date...
author: Christina N.

description: Porn on the walls, waterbeds, and old school booths! This place definitely has a unique vibe which could be worth checking out but I mostly felt stuffy and a little gross when I was there. We got there a little after opening (7pm) and it was already really crowded, so be prepared to wait if you want to order from the one working bartender.
author: Alaina P.

description: This bar is extremely unprofessional and racist. If you notice all of the negative reviews come from black, indian, and latino patrons or designated drivers. This bar promotes DUIs aggro/racist security guards and flat out disrespectful bartenders. They will never get my money!
author: Michael L.

description: This place is a trip. The ambiance is the only reason to come here as you can get drinks anywhere. You feel immersed in the owners weird mindset and it's relaxing, social and makes you want to laugh.
author: Steven D.

description:
Loved it. Super original dive bar. 




How to even begin a review on a place like this....what I saw from no particular order of appearance...Water bed lounge with suspect shag bedding. Raider fan bar tender and possibly owner? Strong drinks. Awesome decor. When your backdrop is the one from scar face, that's all that's said and done. Semi subliminal porn playing on the screens mixed with skateboarding videos and some o
author: Sandrine V.

description:
Themed dive bar with cheap drinks. It's a pretty small space but it has some pretty eclectic decorations going on with the water bed seating, or you can sit in a booth, old televisions everywhere, bras everywhere, nude women printed onto the ground and porn spliced into old advertisements on the television. Makes for an interesting, but pretty fun vibe. 

There's space for dancing and sitting which is nice. Drinks aren't terribly strong, but I repeat, they're cheap.
author: Kayla U.

description:
Lewd and one of a kind! 

Kozy Kar is unlike any other bar you'll go to. By no means is it the best bar you'll go to in terms of drinks, but the quirkiness of it is what makes it stand out from the rest. Porn all over the wall? Cars for seats aka the classic hook up spot for teenagers? Water beds? Dude, who even owns a water bed anymore! I mean, c'mon that's all pretty unique and absolutely memorable. 

It will be hard to get a seat as it gets really busy so if you're trying to come here only to immerse yourself into the cheeky experience at least once, I'd suggest coming in at an off hour.  

Although it's a place that will without a doubt make you laugh, I wouldn't go back just for a casual drink and chat with a friend. This is definitely more of a, "Omg, you haven't been to the porn bar in SF? We HAVE to go!!" sort of deal. 

But regardless, check it out, have a drink, and enjoy the wackiness that is Kozy Kar!
author: Mars S.

description:
Very very unique. In a good way. Definitely have to be open minded and this is why.

There is TV,s everywhere. And what are the playing you ask? Old baseball clips, football clips, commercials, and porn. Yes, porn! Every pervs dream haha! Bunch of cool car memorabilia everywhere, lava lamps, and an infinity mirror floor! My wife and I definitely had a great time, and good laughs. 

Little musty inside but that's probably because it was so packed and everyone was talking and having an awesome time. 

The bartender was really cool, very welcoming and wasn't arrogant asshole like a lot of bartenders in the area. Definitely coming back next visit! 

Thank you guys!
author: Eddie H.

description: Fun bar, but super smelly inside... also they had clips of porn playing around so I wouldn't take someone you're trying to impress here. Haha!
author: Janet H.

description: Interested place.  Very dirty, and the nastiest bathroom that I have ever been in.  Why 5 stars, I had a ton of fun!
author: Mark T.

description: What is up with that asshole "bouncer." So I "tried" to come here with 3 friends on MLK day. As soon as  we walk up, this idiot security yells out in a wanna be authoritative voice, "who's driving?!" I'm like, ok this is odd, but I say I am. Then he says Im the only one not allowed in because I'm driving? I've never heard no BS like that in my life! Then going to say that it's common practice in sf as if I'm some fuckin tourist that doesn't drink out there every fuckin night. It took everything in me not to slap the piss out of him. I guess he figures he didn't need 4 black guys coming into HIS bar on MLK day, so he found whatever excuse he could come up with in his tiny little brain to turn us away. And yes, all 4 of us did leave. Im sure the owners will be so proud.  Racist bar in every definition of the word.
author: Glen A.

description:
Super fun bar on Polk St. We learned that the bars here can show porn, which we surprised to see juxtaposed alongside child cartoons on some of the screens inside. I guess that's the SF quirky most are looking for. 

Drinks were decently priced. Great place for groups with the "kars" for seating in the back
author: Garrett W.

description:
This place is very unique and have an old school vibe to it. I went on 10/4/17 for the comedy show and the comedians were quite decent. The good thing is that when a comedian gets up and there not too funny, you can just turn your head and watch porn, hehe...

The bartender was great and the drinks were quite cheap to be in the city. I really had a great time and will go again on their comedy night.
author: Janae M.

description:
4 + stars for the cheap drinks, the porn, & the overall decor. I would have given this place 5 stars but there was one [bartending] douchebag with long hair at the bar (that was like 0 stars... had to even write this doggone review today -- yes read on..) that served me a drink and put no lime in it, and me not wanting to bother him just grabbed one from the bucket which was available right in front of me

He started shouting "don't ever do that again" - I said "I'm sorry"... I told him I'm from Texas and we are not so uptight there. Showed him my Texas ID. My dear heavens!! Then he went on with "he is grossed out and about to puke because he doesn't know where my hands have been" - said it was his birthday and I just ruined it for him... oh my! #1. He can't consume while working so regardless this doesn't affect him, 2. Pretty sad to be spending his birthday here --- (oh yeah!! -- like I know where his hands have been and he can grab stuff and serve people...) I said "Sorry bro... just chill" -- his last words "shut up, get out" (whilst raising the hose used for cranberry juice apparently threatening he would splash it straight into the bar if I didn't leave. ( -- total psycho.)

Another BS SF experience...
author: Rico A.

description: Cool bar in San Francisco. The music could have been better though. The drinks were good and it was a vibrant scene. There was a weird moment, though, when I happened to look up and noticed porn on the TV screen. Only in San Francisco, I guess.
author: Shenna J.

description:
There is no other Kozy Kar.  This spot is one of a kind and well worth a visit.  What it is not is a place you would bring your Mom.  

Some of the things you'll find here include:

*Not one, but TWO Waterbeds
*An empty Hot Tub used as one of the Booths
*A Dance Floor covered in pictures of Naked Girls
*A Pinball Machine
*Bras hanging from the Ceiling
*Olympia Beer in Cans
*Trivia Night
*Comfy Boat Chairs at the Bar
...and... hmm... one other thing... ... it will come to me...
*Oh yeah - Porn.  Lot's of Porn.  

Right in the friendly confines of The PolkNob, where so many of the bars have gentrified, you have this unapologeticly not gentrified spot.  Now, there are times when porn in a bar is a big red flag.  Are all of the people in the bar men?  Are some of them wearing raincoats?  Is the floor oddly sticky? ... Worry not, that's not what we're talking about here.  

There is an air of debauchery here.  Kozy Kar is a really fun spot, and as the night goes on, it gets to be quite a den of iniquity - you know, in a good way.  One second, the TV's in the bar are playing cheesy 70's music videos, the next, they cut to 10-15 seconds of porn.  And then there's the Waterbeds.  You can use your imagination, but as another Yelper pointed out, you may want to dip yourself in hand sanitizer after visiting the one in back with the booth.  Again, in a good way... I guess.  Of course, all of this is done in the context of a dive-bar in one of the nicer neighborhoods in SF.  

Bar-wise, I think the service is always terrific.  Cool bartenders, too.  There is no draft beer, but they make up for that by having Olympia in cans.  I haven't had mixed drinks here, but I've heard from fellow imbibers that the drinks are stiff.  (No allusion to the Porn intended)  And, they crowd is the typical Polk Street set.  Depending on the time, it can be quiet - but it usually gets jumping after midnight.  BTW - It's worth mentioning they don't open until 7pm.

Everyone I've come here with has got a kick out of it.  But I have a friend who extolls it's virtues as a good weed-out spot.  If you bring someone here and they get bent out of shape about it, it's a sign to move on.  Fortunately, I've never run into that problem.
author: Adam S.

description: Came here for Halloween weekend and it was wild. Definitely a lot of fun but it was pretty packed and the line to get in was long. This bar is as it states, Kozy. It is quite small and on a busy weekend like Halloween it was very very cozy and hot. Definitely worth checking out if you're like me and you're into random, divey, and unique places to grab a drink or two. I would recommend going on a not so busy night to really enjoy the experience without wanting to rip your clothes off from the heat. Unless you're into that, then this is probably the place to do that. **not suggesting you do it though**
author: Ana V.

description: This place was fun. Very chill. The waterbed was so much fun to take pictures on. The porn was a nice touch, although the "shock" wears off quick. It's a great place for a drink with friends. The bartender and security guard were friendly too. Would definitely recommend for a night after work where you just want to bond with some coworkers or close friends.
author: Margaret M.

description:
Love this type of bar , very edgy
They play porn on all the tvs lol and have nude pics on the floor. Drinks are very strong so that's a plus. I would definitely recommend this bar
author: Betzybebb G.

description: Drinks are not great but boy this is a fun bar! Music is nice, ambience is raw (watch out for hardcore scenes on the TVs). Future entrepreneurs were probably made on those waterbeds!
author: Juan S.

description:
Bouncer with cool mustache and ponytail and no future didn't let me in with a valid ID. Not a problem anywhere else.

author: Nicolaas C.

description:
I imagined this place somewhat larger. As soon as we walked in it was like a maze trying to get through (bumping into sweaty people at the bar). Unfortunately it was way to packed and we couldn't find somewhere to sit so we opted to get shots and a round of drinks. The bartender was supper cool and even recorded me and my boyfriend taking our shots lol. 

It gets really hot in here! 
I put almost a dollar inside a pin ball machine and had no luck. It didn't work :/ lol

The atmosphere is pretty cool and the busses/ jacuzzi seats/ and water beds are pretty dope. They have bras every where as decor & porn videos being projected on TV. 

Overall this place was awesome.
author: Lizbeth M.

description: "dirty dive bar" but actually so disgusting overall. sloppy people, horrible horrible customer service. This place is so unwelcoming in every way. I like the idea of the bar and how unique and weird it's suppose to be. however, it is just weird and uncomfortable and full of disgusting and weird people. not in a good way :) will never come back to this shithole. don't waste your time. bad reviews are very right.
author: Anile O.

description: This place is obscene and a must stop on your trip. I love to travel to new destinations and see things I have never seen before, Kozy Kar Bar fits the bill. I can honestly say I have never been to a 70's style bar with old pornography on the walls and water beds to lounge in. My boyfriend and I laid on the water bed, laughed, and enjoyed delicious fernet shots. This place is chill as can be, honestly, just DO IT. Go here and see for yourself! Great for picture opps and all out unadulterated fun.
author: Glory F.

description: Pure entertainment. One of the most uniquely San Francisco watering holes you can take an out-of-town guest to. Grab a seat at the hot tub booth, or on the waterbed, or find yourself falling into the abyss of lights spiraling down into the underworld (it's just an optical illusion, don't worry). $3 PBRs and an all-around good time, different than the rest of the Polk Street scene. What's not to love?!
author: Andy L.

description: This bar is hilarious. There's porn on the ceilings and on the TV's combined with vintage commercials. You can sit in a water bed, a hot tub, or an old van's seats. If you're looking for a unique bar experience, this is definitely the place to go.
author: Emma J.

description:
A 70s themed dive bar like no other! 

From the water beds to the jacuzzi and vintage car seating this place is so cool and unique. Not to mention the 30 second intermissions of porn on the TV screens! 

Came here with a group of friends and had such a laugh!! It also has a great vibe with kind people that just want to get up and dance! 

Would definitely recommend this place as a must do! It's an experience like no other and the cheap drinks totally make it worth it!
author: Megan S.

description:
What an interesting dingy dive bar! Definitely something new. I came here with a few friends, and after we ordered our drinks at the bar, we took a seat on what initially looked like a cushion-y surface... but turned out to be waterbed. CONFESSION: I've never been on a waterbed before, so that was quite an experience. 

We enjoyed lively conversation while "admiring" the bras on the ceiling and photos of naked women around the room. There are pinball machines and themed booths towards the back of the bar. Not the cleanest bar in the world, but I had fun. This is one of those places that doesn't give a crap about what other bars are doing. It's just flaunting it's own unique personality!
author: Stefanie C.

description:
Super divey place with a rather young, barely-out-of-college crowd. As with the name of this joint, the decor recalls back-seat teenage trysts from a bygone boom-chicka-wawa era when VW vans and Chevy Impalas were in vogue. In fact, there are literally hollowed-out vans that serve as waterbed "booths." What's more, when your eyes begin to adjust to the surroundings, you'll notice porn clippings plastered everywhere. Even the TVs will switch suddenly to vintage porn for a few seconds every now and then - but only just enough to force you to do a double-take. 

The drinks are rather unmemorable. Worth checking out if you're into a serious throwback to the past, at least until your politically correct sensibilities start getting the better of you.
author: Vincent L.

description:
Well it is a dive bar. I may upgrade this review as the one and only time I stopped in to get a drink and it was Santa Con. Couldn't get to the bar, couldn't get a drink, stupidly crowded. Couldn't get a seat. Seemed dirty
. Will try again when its not so crazy.
author: Michael S.

description: Grungy bars like these are my favorite because of the casual and fun atmosphere.  Explicit videos and xxx photos are just an added touch to its craziness.  There's a water bed and cool other oddities to find...if you don't get to buzzed that is.
author: Cynthia A.

description: Went first time, 5/5 stars. If you like porn on the tv, water beds and dive bars... and rude inbred managers then this is your place. The manager was a rude dick on my second visit. He was so bad it killed the vibe and dropped this to a one star review.
author: Michael O.

description: Oh man, where do I start? My date and I were waiting outside for him to open 10 minutes late. We go in, check the place out and see a waterbed. We're hanging out just minding our own business when the dickhead of an owner comes up to us and says "are you going to buy anything? I feel like I'm working for free" when my date retorted he says "if you're going to be a smart ass then just get the fuck out". We left abruptly thereafter. This place is physically filthy and the manager is beyond rude.
author: Amanda M.

description: I love this place. With the porn on the walls, and the highschool sex locations, it is guaranteed to be a good time and a wild one. Surprise a friend here
author: Ross S.

description: This place is a cool concept and we enjoyed the decor. Some of the reviews were correct in saying it was creepy but for the wrong reasons. It had nothing to do with the porn in the back ground and more about the people. It was full of semi retarded hipsters who lack social skills to hold a conversation and just walked in circles looking at their phones till they found their safe space or the next protest to attend. Also seemed like a lot of people we on drugs.
author: Nick M.

description: Are you really supposed to give this place 5 stars? Like seriously, it's a dive bar that plays porn on the tv...lol would you take me seriously if I gave it 5? No...lol but this place is awesome, fun to be in and definitely easy on the wallet with those dive bar drinks. Now only bad part was on a busy labor day weekend, to only have 1 bartender is not the smartest thing, so service could have been better. But 2nd time being here and probably not my last, fun time every time.
author: Andrew M.

description:
Best parts about this bar...

1. Absolute Dive
2. Takes cards (with a $1 fee)
3. Retro clips/porn on the TVs
4. Random car/Jacuzzi parts and waterbeds to sit in/on/around
5. Pinball
6. Strong drinks

Great way to spend an evening out, and if you get there early enough you can get into the waterbed in the hollowed out van.  Heaven (just don't bring a black light)!
author: Jes G.

description: Maybe this is because I'm a midwestern grandma at heart who didn't drink enough shots to fully appreciate this place, but this wasn't my scene (to be fair, I didn't expect to love it coming in, but could see why a lot if people like it here). Definitely a unique place worth checking out though for their eclectic retro porn, divey bra decor, waterbeds, and funky lit up floors. The bathroom stall on the left in the women's bathroom has a découpage type of wallpaper made out of photos of penises. At least you can play an adult version of "Where's Waldo?" while you're sitting in there?
author: Stacy K.

description: We came here last night it was an awesome experience. They have porn and baseball in all the screens. We saw a couple who looked so uncomfortable by it, it was pretty funny!. Anyway this bar is super cool, the bartenders are all super cool.. We also appreciated the car memorabilia
author: Evelyn L.

description: I happen to like the old era porn crazy atmosphere because it's DIFFERENT than the fancy lounges all around town. The water beds, the posters of naked women, the cheesy porn, the bras hanging all added to the seedy, funny character of this bar. They have classic stiff drinks! What's not to like? Oh yeah, how horribly crowded it gets. I had to escape after a certain point because it was too full of people that I felt overwhelmed. No one seems to care much about fire code in SF! Anyway, cool spot if you go early.
author: Jen B.

description:
My friend once said, "Everyone is a pervert...EVERYONE." If you claimed not to be, than you were are a "LIAR". His words. Not mine.

As a former Catholic school girl, growing up, I was very shy and innocent. Despite my cray cray Yelp persona, I'm still that "shy and innocent" girl inside. Seriously. Just ask my dad.

And then came, Kozy Kar...

HOLY F*CK!

Titties all over the walls, on the floor, in the bathroom, bouncing on the TV screens....my eyes got more exercise than at 24 Hour Fitness (I took a pic of the XXX wall but it's NSFW and the last thing I want is HR cracking the whip on you.)

It doesn't stop there...

Stripper pole, jacuzzi, shagged covered motion in the ocean waterbeds, vintage VW seats and even a "love shack" inside a converted VW van. Black light time! And I don't mean for a rave party.

It may be tacky. It may retro cheesy. It may be a bit dingy. But I f*cking loved it!

Where else can you sip a stiff drink while watching money shots while c*ck 'n cuddling on a waterbed?

Only IN Kozy Kar. 
http://www.yelp.com/biz_photos/TqPNHkYhk3t-hUPQHW2JVA?select=Kh2rlSxauaDGbNADE4u4HQ#YjN65iCBjGXygWdMo4ER3A 

I enjoyed every moment there especially all the "eyes" looking at me!

Yeup, I AM A PERVERT.

*Le Sigh*


OTHER NOTES:
*Stiff cocktails: $7-$8
*5 drinking alcoves (e.g. waterbeds, VW van, jacuzzi, etc)
*70s-80s movies playing with soft porn mixed in
*Small dance floor 
*Marina-type crowd
*Two restroom stalls with changing room curtains
*Credit cards accepted
author: Cherylynn N.

description: A cool one of a kind place. Porn on the walls/floor. Occasionally popping up on the tv screens. Very unique & not  just the "same old bar". I would have given it 5 stars but the bathroom was very bad & I feared seeing the place with the lights on.
author: Christopher C.

description:
Date rape is not a joke.
You have got to remove the box wine sign.
Unacceptable.  Even if everything about your bar is tongue in cheek or porn etc. making light of date rape isn't ok.
author: Octavia H.

description:
FREE PORN AND THROWBACK 70's CARTOONS (ingenious ice breakers if you ask me!) mixed with CHEAP STIFF DRINKS and you already know you're in for a good time! They even offer bar goers semi private minibus shaped booths fully equipped with personal TVs all the way towards the back of the bar! If you didn't think it could get any better they even have a HUGE WATER BED near the entranceway, vintage centerfold posters covering the walls, ceiling mirrors galore, and old bras hanging from every light fixture--all, of course, to help set the mood for the night! ;) BUTTT... good luck trying to use the restroom--it's damn near IMPOSSIBLE to maneuver your way through the crowd of people!! 

Kozy Kar was a bit packed when we arrived (every seat was TAKEN!) around 11:30PM but, luckily, there was NO WAIT to get in and NO COVER charge! The bar, in my opinion, is oddly shaped as it reminds me of an elongated hallway where everyone is literally neck and neck with each other! Crowd was pretty mellow filled with your usual hipsters mixed in with fellow dive bar goers. Dress code is super casual and everyone was pretty friendly--although it took a while to wave down bartenders and put in our drink orders. If you're planning on staying awhile I suggest coming early to secure a table/waterbed/booth/barstool!
author: Steph M.

description:
If you don't have a good sense of humor, you're probably not going to be able to appreciate this place. 

It's small and janky and well, there are pornos playing on the tvs. It's just different and that's what makes it awesome. There's a very small dance floor that you can maybe get a few moves in, but generally people just hang out and talk about their surroundings. You're not going to find many other bars with a decor quite like this.
author: Kelly G.

description:
Brought my birthday in at midnight on the water bed under a ceiling of porn- I've never done that before!

I would really rate this place three stars but I am going to four for the experience alone. That's what this place is, a unique experience you can't find anywhere else.

Don't expect fancy or elaborate drinks. The best beer was lagunitas in a bottle. A mixed crowd, mostly in mid-late 20s. I enjoyed people watching from the comfort of spooning my friends on the water bed.
author: Melanie M.

description:
I like this bar because they have subliminal porn playing everywhere. 

It is pretty awesome, because you know how sometimes you go to a bar and your eyes start to wander around or you get bored?Well there is always something to watch here!! 

They also have water beds, sofas, and a stripper pole here, what better to accompany your subliminal porn watching with. 
Reasonably priced beer!

Downside is that the bar area is really crowded and gets squishy really easily.
author: Tiffany Y.

description: I am giving this bar 4 stars for the fun theme. I took some friends from out of town here. They didn't suspect a thing and we're definitely surprised!  It can be hard to get a drink in here during peek time, but the entertaining videos help remedy the wait at the bar.  Definitely a mixed crowed here, you've got your hipsters, dive bar patrons, and young professionals alike. Kozy' is worth checking out if you've never been before.
author: Josh S.

description:
Where else can a person with ADHD watch Fat Albert for 30 seconds followed by 30 seconds of porn, followed by 30 seconds of Jem, followed by 30 seconds of  1980's Nintendo commercials, and back to porn? 
When you get bored of watching porn and 80's cheese, you can play Eye Spy; they have a large array of all electronic toys from the 80's. This place is fantastic! 
Then, when you tire of eye spy, go check out one of the themed booths to watch more porn and 80's cartoons. 
I really dig the booth made with smarmy Jacuzzi seats. Only thing missing is Leisure Suit Larry by my side. Not sure if I'd want to touch the waterbed booth, though.
author: Kara B.

description:
Just walking in here, you get the sense that you're at risk of inadvertently catching an STD; I can only imagine what you'd find by shining a blacklight across the the 70's-era waterbed and velvet seat covers. I've also yet to use the men's bathroom here without hearing someone talk about yay or actually witnessing someone take a bump.

Still this place has a unique appeal that sets itself apart from most of the other bars on Polk street, and I can appreciate that. 

They've gotta work on the traffic choke point mid-way through the bar though, I've seen a few near-fights break out due to there not being enough room for people to move freely in both directions.
author: Madhu P.

description:
This was one of the most interesting bars I've ever visited (so far). I only had one drink here (rum & coke) because 1.) I'm a college student on a budget xD 2.) There were some questionable types in here. The pictures on the wall are funny, yes they're girls in bikinis or naked but there are some random guys there lol. The main attraction I think, is the TVs, because it'll remind of your childhood for a moment and then change into some porn. I found that pretty hilarious. When you're terribly drunk, I imagine that can do quite some work on you. Just like the name implies, it's like you're sitting inside one big cozy car lol. It's nicely decorated. I'd give it 4 stars but getting dirty looks from guys who are obviously waiting for you to fall over and be sloppy drunk is not the business. ._. 

Cheers on being my first bar stop in San Francisco ^.^
author: Stars S.

description:
The bartender was pretty rude. I came in with an out of state ID (mind you I'm 27) and visiting from florida and I was accused of having a false ID and got kicked out rather rudely. I wasn't asked for any other forum of ID just a blunt "get the **** out of my bar" I guess I shouldn't be so upset because it's nice to look young. However, I'm pretty sure he didn't like that I was Hispanic. he wasn't welcoming from the start. It took forever for him to come up to me. Then for you to yell at me? What? Oh well. The place looked dirty. The staff just seemed pretentious. And the bartender is a psycho. 

Avoid this place. The bay has better bars.
author: Jenell C.

description: Unique spot, I agree. I've been coming into this bar for a while, always good laughs and fun environment, although the last few times the staff had been super rude to us for no reason. Not cool at all.
author: Ferran T.

description:
If raunchy is one word to describe Kozy Kar, divey is the most certainly the other.

It's not a classic dive bar by any stretch, not even with the wild array that SF has to offer. It is a place where pretension does not fly, where drinks are as stiff as they appear, and where bathrooms should never be inspected with a UV light. The nods to the retro porn decor are a head turning touch and the crowd is almost always an interesting cast of characters.

Bartenders are a fun bunch, though they're not the easiest to get to when the place gets crowded. Best to pick a spot, like the car booth and sip slowly. The music can best be described as a pseudo 70s / 80s collection of hits in case one forgets where they are. Beware of the water bed, I'm still not entirely sure how that thing hasn't burst from a pen in the pocket yet. 

Surprisingly, the place works well as a party venue. Be it a birthday or a going away, friends can come here without having to worry about cover or sufficient space to mingle. The last farewell I attended here a few Halloweens ago was an epic evening, one that burns Kozy Kar into my memory of SF haunts of drunken celebrations and friendly encounters.

Welcome to NYC A.
author: Jando S.

description:
I truly love this place, but last night was ridiculous. I don't partake in SantaCon and know it's a tough day on bartenders, as I also work in the hospitality industry. It was a busy night and I'm sure the staff were over it.
The bartender/manager, I believe his name was Benny, was obviously not having a good day. My friend was ordering us drinks and we didn't hear him ask the bartender to get whatever my friend and I wanted. He saw we weren't paying attention and skipped my friend's order completely, and started to move away. I called him back and attempted to apologize for my lack of awareness and started to order my drink. He started talking back to me and belittling me. It was completely out of the blue! 
So we ask him why he's being so rude when it was completely uncalled for. I tried getting on his level and explaining I also just worked a 12 hour shift in the same business and he kept interrupting me, yelling at me, and basically said that I was the "insert choice word here". I even tried to reason with him that the customer is not always right, but what had we done to bring this attitude out of him?
Now at this point my friends and I were riled up and just wanted to stop being called names and being yelled at. He grabbed our drinks, tossed them out, then screamed that we were cut off. We left with him ranting behind us.
I love this bar. It's fun, unique and the drinks are good. But he was an "insert choice word here". My theory: he probably just got dumped.
author: Rebtar I.

description:
HOW CAN YOU NOT LIKE THIS PLACE?!?  they have bendy straws!!!!

kozy kar is a raunchy little bar that you have to go to at least once in your life.  or maybe twice because you'll have to come back and bring people who've never been here before without telling them what's up.  make sure they notice the subliminal porn playing on the television.

one weird thing is that the bathrooms don't have doors.  they have curtains that don't close all the way. 

a bartender let me charge my iphone behind the bar which was nice.  he was pretty fucking friendly even though we accidentally knocked over a stack of napkins and took a bunch of straws and started sticking them up our nose / mouths.  really mature... i know.  he ended up taking the straws away from us and putting them in the back, but was joke-y about it haha
author: Jennifer L.

description: This place is different than most. We're talking about 80s commercials and videos with some classic playlists and random porn scenes. Very different, lol. So IF you're okay with that part you'll see the cool set up of the place. Disco ball car seat booths. We were doing a pub crawl here and man the bartender and the bouncer really brought charm to the place. Friendly, insightful and gave some good suggestions as to what else to see on Polk. Will be going back! The bouncer Jason was really awesome to talk to and so are the bartenders who work there, some from out of country just working during the meantime before they hop to the next place on the map!
author: Krystal L.

description:
Dear Tom, 

After a brutal day your liquid treats gave me life. Produced a joy inside my life that quite frankly I felt had been stolen by traumatic experience prior.

Yes! 

Tom, aka Kozy Kar you were there for me when I need some a refreshing pick-me-up. You provided this service with generosity and at a very low cost.

Yes! 

$21 was enough to buy my companions and I enough spiked juice to forget about our woes. And although I didn't catch those graphic pornographic snippets on tv, I was bombarded by photos of man meat in the stall. 

Yes! 

I am a fan! I love how you unquestionably drove me to utter intoxication. I felt oh so safe and secure. So Tom thank you for the ride! 

Would definitely recommend the reasonably priced liquor and the great company. It wasn't crowded but the company was well kept!
author: Jenelle B.

description:
Adds some character to the otherwise undergrad-infested, basic crowd of Polk Street.

Kozy Kar feels like a '70s porn set, with furry walls, water bed booths and -- get this -- naked women wallpaper. But not just any naked women, no -- women from at least 2-3 decades past which makes the view more, um, interesting. The bar seating, meanwhile, is made up of old leather car seats. You have to see this place to believe it.

The bartenders are usually cute boys. Don't expect fancy cocktails, obvi, but your standard beer and G+T will serve you just fine in this joint.

Last time I stopped in here at around 9pm which was perfect. When I left at around 11ish there was actually a line out the door, so beware of arriving too late on a weekend night. (Side note: I never understood lines to get into bars. Clubs, ok, maybe, but bars?!) 

Another word of warning: My friend told me someone actually caught bed bugs or some kind of rash from sitting on the water beds before. I wouldn't be surprised but also have no proof to back this story up. (This is probably how rumors get started, oops.) Anyway I would avoid them just to be safe!
author: Tiffany W.

description: I was recommended this place from another bartender in the area. He described it as "only in San Francisco" and he wasn't wrong. This bar is definitely a one-of-a-kind, dive bar. Not really my style, but the bartender did make one of the best blueberry lemondrops I've ever had the pleasure of drinking. If you enjoy watching porn while you drink in small, dark, grungy places, then this is your place! If you don't, then I really wouldn't recommend it, but I can't fault the establishment for my personal preference. Like I said, the drinks were on point, so for that, I commend you!
author: Coria R.

description: I'll be honest, I'm a little drunk. But this place is awesome. I wish the game machine would work though.
author: Lunetta K.

description: Drinks were not overly priced like everywhere in the city, but still not a great place to relax and have good conversations...I almost felt like more than half of the customers were underage
author: Koby G.

description:
Tom, you adorable little Pisces: Thank you! 

You were so amazing. This place was definitely cozy, although I do not recall seeing any porn on the tv's and Tom wouldn't let me plug in my phone to start a dance party. 

It's okay though because  I got incredibly drunk. 

I didn't like that the restrooms didn't  have doors....just curtains. I was worried  someone would walk in on me. At least it was clean. 

Met this lovely gay couple who got my friends and I a round of shots (image provided) and Tom whipped us up something special too. 

It was random and fun even though it was totally dead on a Sunday. I would definitely come back.
author: Lydia L.

description: Definitely visit at least once in your lifetime, very interesting decor and fun crowd. We came for their monthly dirty comedy show and got some free cheese pizza along with a very entertaining show! Beers were not as cheap as I thought, for a dive bar, but hey, a good time's a good time!
author: Mingmei N.

description: You really just have to go see this place.. From what I have experienced, it truly is one of a kind... It doesn't really deserve four stars, but the experience is what you should come in for... As you walk in, there is a waterbed to the left next to the bar for people to lay on. The drinks are pretty regular, nothing special, but the vibe of the venue is.. rather interesting. There are arcades and TV's that play short clips from porn videos which then switch to music videos (maybe?). Anyway, its a cool experience. You have to come in once just to check it out.
author: Steven P.

description:
Disclaimer:  I'm clearly intoxicated

+5 because they have colored chalk in each bathroom stall and a full length private mirror.


I was able to retouch my makeup privately and write "Redrum" all over my stall
author: Jacquelynne S.

description: Awesome environment if you're open to a fun and quirky feel. I found it unique as a bar can get, needless to say I loved it! Drinks are average but the feel of the bar makes it 4 stars for sure!
author: Jacqulynn O.

description:
Umm......yeah, Kozy Kar is definitely a dfferent kind of dive bar. It gets pretty crowded and can be a lot of fun, especially if your idea of fun is drinking cheap beer and watching vintage porn snippets while listening to 70s music. They've got a theme here and they've hit the bullseye. The decor is over-the-top trashy and unapologetic, with porn literally plastered on the floors, walls, and ceiling. They have a number of odd booths (jacuzzi, waterbed, back of van, etc...) and the main bar, but the place isn't huge so it can get crowded. It's not for everyone, but if you're bar-hopping in the area (which is what we were doing), it's probably a must stop.

Have fun...?
author: Devin A.

description:
I really don't want to ruin this place for anyone who hasn't experienced it. So look I am just going to tell you some things that happened to me. These things may not happen to you. But these things do happen here. This really is a place you have to experience once in your life. Anyplace that makes it onto a bucket list for San Francisco nightlife deserves all of the stars. That means it has something you can't get anywhere else in the city and in the world for that much.

Everything looks normal when you enter. This is a nice little dive bar you think. Oh kozy I wonder if there are nice couches in there to have a drink on. And that my friends is where everything stops being normal. So here you go: snapshots of my night in Kozy Kar. Have fun, don't tell anyone your experience till after they try it for the first time and then look at each other uncomfortably for the next 15 minutes before never talking about it again.

I stepped on naked women and men. 
I happily jumped into the seat of a creepy rapist van. 
I watched a lot of porn. 
I watched shows from the 70's while eating food. 
I touched what I believe was fur. 
I played video games.
I sat on a waterbed.
I made out with a woman on a waterbed.
I watched more porn. 
I held naked women and men in my hands. 
I was squished between random people making out on a waterbed. 

5/5 would go again. Would never go again.
author: Nick R.

description:
Ha, such an esoteric place filled with porn splices, car seats, waterbed, old doors, and vans.

Total dive bar!
author: Wally W.

description:
5 Stars for what it is.

First time I went there I was alone waiting for the stupid #1 bus home.  Cheap beer, not crowded.  Awesome bartenders.

Second time, it was the Chinese New Year Parade and I was soaking wet and couldn't get a bus and full of gear and backpack.  Walked in to find it crowded...not a seat.  I just lost my mind and shouted "who do I have to $*@^ to get a beer around here????"

Luckily there were a bunch of cool guys there willing to take me in as a mascot and I had a great time.  

Third time, I finally noticed the 70's Playmate laminates on the bar, the 70"s Playgirl nude dudes in the ladies room and the waterbed.  Yowzah!  

Love it.  Great for groups and even if you are just waiting for the bus and want a couple of beers.  

*****  They take cards, with a $1.00 sur-charge and also, they do not except coins.  AT ALL.  What was I thinking trying to pay for a $4.00 beer with 3 Ones and 4 quarters!?  

I know.... I know... 

I love it.  Lots of annoying young girls who order Midori Sours..  but, live and let live. 

BTW.  Whoever calls this "Soft Core Porn" doesn't know anything about porn.

Bow Chicka Bow Bow....
author: Gina H.

description:
underwhelming AF.  Granted, it was a random Wednesday, but I had some high sexpectations for this place that were not fulfilled.  I had multiple people tell me that KK is a "porn bar with waterbeds."  I walked in, expecting titties in my face and some raunchy loud tv, and came in to basically dead silence with minimal soft porn showing on mini wall tvs.  Also, they showed the same clip of porn over and over again, HELLO I NEED VARIETY.
       The drinks were moderately strong, the waitstaff was unmemorable, and the clientele was meh.*  Overall, I expected a much naughtier environment.  I felt too wholesome being in there and we only stayed for one drink.  If you're looking for a raunchy place to spend your Wednesday, this is NOT the place.


**except the Boston Terrier at the bar, who took up two stools at the bar and didn't give a canine fuck.  He was the one great part of the clientele.
author: Lizzy M.

description:
Went here because everyone says it's that place you have to go to at least once. It's pretty entertaining for a few drinks but wouldn't stay long. The crowd was weird, lots of people from out of town and a little bit of an older crew.

Bartenders are awesome! Very friendly and accommodating. The porn flashing on the TV's is definitely different and a bold move but just not for me. Especially when you are talking to someone you just met... it's a little distracting haha. Safe to say we came, we saw, we'll always remember, but we probably won't be back.
author: Mandy A.

description:
For the first time in my life, I saw the "how many licks does it take to get to the Tootsie Roll center of a Tootsie Pop?" commercial they way it was meant to be seen...

Immediately followed by hardcore porn. 

Obviously, there is a certain "icky" factor that is unavoidable here, but it's nothing you can't drink away. 

5 stars... Because waterbeds.
author: Rachael G.

description:
I really want to love this place...truly I do.  The waterbed booth, van booth, hot tub booth and streaming porn is just my sort of weird.  

However this place reeks of urine.  It burns your eyes walking in and makes you feel certain everything in here has a sticky film... I'll save you the experience of testing that theory...it does.  Because of this it feels a little creepy... like walking into a Chainsaw Massacre amusement park run by child molesters ... that being said it obviously deserves a peek in.  I'd even grab a drink if they cut down on the absorbant surfaces and lysoled the #$&@ out of it.
author: Summer S.

description:
I came by on a Tuesday night with my friend who was visiting from Miami and my roomie. I just moved to SF, and my roomie recommended this bar because it had "interesting pictures" put up around the bar. Now I know what she means! There's naked chicks plastered all over the ceiling and on the bar top. Interesting indeed.

There's also a few TVs in the bar and they show little snippets of porn in between cartoons or movies. Hilarious and entertaining! 

The bartender, I believe his name was Benny, was so great. One of the best bartenders I've encountered in SF so far. He told us he was from Tampa so we kind of bonded talking crap about FL haha! I had a few drinks here and the prices weren't so bad. Definitely cheaper than drinking in Miami, that's for sure. They accept credit cards here too, if that's important to you.

When we closed our tabs, we told Benny we though he was a great bartender. We went to hang out on the waterbed by the entrance while finishing our last drinks and Benny came over and handed the 3 of us a free shot for saying we liked him. That was really cool of him to do! Nice guy :)

Would definitely bring more out-of-towners here because there's definitely no bars like this in Miami, and my friends would get a kick out of it.
author: Sandra N.

description:
Could not enjoy this place without a good load of alcohol already in me, so don't start your night here. It's pretty fun and entertaining what with the naked ladies everywhere and porn playing on the screens, but overall it's a little bit too much... it gets incredibly crowded, not too many places to sit, and it's overall a bit small. I can see why this is definitely an experience and a place you have to hit up on Polk, but just be warned that it might not be the place you hang out longest. 

Seriously, though, take a shot here.
author: Lulu P.

description: Cheap beers and drinks. They have a bed inside a van you can chill in, TVs shift from old sports clips to vintage porn movies. Classy, five stars for young people. Great location and staff.
author: Karl S.

description: What's not to like, it's like walking back into a frat house in college.  Water bed, porn, lots of happy people.  Bathrooms work and that's what counts.  Sometimes is really crowded but that's when you tip the bouncer and skip the line
author: P A.

description: Hey, they take credit cards!  Dive bar in SF that has technology!  I thought I was watching Schoolhouse Rock and then out of nowhere I was watching vivid porn!  Pretty funny.  They have a bed when you walk in and people are always laying on it.  I wouldn't touch it because it just seems kind of nasty.  Strangers on a bed with shoes on everyday?  Gross. Take it for what it is, though.  Divey bar with porn playing everywhere and random nudie pics on the floor.  I think they're even auditioning for amateur porn stars here.
author: Durty D.

description: Epic quirky bar.  Must experience !!!!   Head all the way to the back and sit in a car booth and watch some ... Cartoons ....True SF
author: T L.

description:
This place screams DIVE BAR! They have porno flashes in between old commercials on the TV and "beds" for you to lay and enjoy a drink.

The beds, especially the one in the front looks like its never been washed before. BEWARE of crusty substances on the blankets... Cool place to go to if you've never been, but will not be back... unless for the shock value of an outside visitor.
author: Brittini S.

description:
I...don't know how I feel about this place. The drinks are cheap, bartenders friendly, but I can't get over the porn. 

If you want to experience something different when you're in SF, this place would probably be a good option. Otherwise, I don't know if I would recommend it.
author: Chantelle T.

description:
Saturday Night.  "Kozy" is there way of trying to hide the fact that there place is hella crowded and small, with people are just shoulder to shoulder and sweaty.  They have about a 4 foot walkway to a small standing area in the back.

I want to say the bartenders made up for it but our party of waited in 3 areas for 10 minutes to no avail.  Better to find a different place.
author: Daniel D.

description: Being that my girl and I are classic van owners and lovers we absolutely love this bar.
author: Alex C.

description:
I had to check out the Kozy Kar for myself last Friday so  I headed over there with a friend for Happy Hour. It was pretty empty around 4:30 p.m. with a couple people here and there. 

The bartender was a real funny guy and laughed when my friend tried to order a Newcastle. No beers on draft and the wine comes in boxes, the white wine isn't chilled but I'm sure they will offer up some ice.

I moved around a few times since there was so much room. The waterbed seats were cold and a little awkward to sit on but I laughed while squirming to stay in my seat. The seats at the bar are a little too close to the counter and kept banging my knees. There are no purse hooks either, but I think they are working on that. 

My big peeve was the bathrooms, the door is open and there are curtains on the stalls instead of doors. You cant really knock on a curtain and I felt a little uncomfortable. 

It was okay, definitely a different place that has a fun feel to it. Maybe I'll go back in a few months after the kinks are worked out.
author: Rebekah T.

description:
Love love love this bar! A must if you live or are visiting SF (and love quirky stuff like I do)!!

Rape van in the bar with a water bed inside it. What more can you ask for?!?! Perfect spot to sit, drink and meet people while all crunched together on a water bed. Just wish they had a cocktail waiter coming to the bed to take orders because once you are in that thing it is hard to get out. 

Also, jacuzzi tub booth seating. Didn't go in there, but how f-in cool is that!?

Almost forgot to mention their staple decor...80's porn all over! Playing on the TV monitors every 10 seconds or so between retro commercials and plastered all over the walls. 

Now for the downside and why I can't give them 5 stars. When I came here recently over President's Day Weekend the bartender was so damn slow. Horrible! The place was packed and there was only one guy working the bar. We waited 15 minutes to order a beer and then just left. 

Also, the bathroom stalls do not have doors, they have curtains. Not a big deal but would be nice to have some privacy with a door. 

Nevertheless the good outways the bad. Check it out! A true gem.
author: Lina K.

description:
Last Sunday night consisted of the following experiences at Kozy Kar:
- Sitting on a furry booth to realize it was a furry waterbed mattress
- Discovering the posters of naked women everywhere. On the bar counters. On the walls. The ceilings. But the classy stuff - 70s playboy, etc.
- One poster in particular spawning a 20 minute debate on whether her boobs were real or not. We disagreed about 5 to 1 that they were fake. Google goggles told us they were real.
- Random video playing that seemed to loop between trippy cartoons, old school hip hop music videos, and hardcore porn.
- Cool booths in the back - made to be like car seats, another waterbed, and a jacuzzi.
- An awesome drink - the sweet tea - its crazy dangerous b/c you can't taste the alcohol. Good balance of slight bitterness of tea + sweetness too. Well made.

Overall a positive experience. Will be back.
author: Ziyan C.

description:
While it isn't somewhere I'd go on my own, visiting while on a clown bar hop was perfect. Nice bartenders, very silly decor - and I mean that as the highest compliment.
 Points for bar originality!
author: Kate G.

description:
YES!  This place is very interesting!! We came here on a week night right when it opened-around 7 PM so there was one other group of people and that was it, so I am not sure about the crowd it attract but I imagine they would be cool!!!  

The decorations are fun to look at, there is TONS to see at this place and the seating and tables are very unique, old car seats, hot tubs, and.....water beds!?  I was skeptical about the water beds and made the decision that I would NOT be going on the water bed.  My boyfriend had other thoughts, he jumped on the water bed which caused the shag rug on top of the bed to move-exposing a cockroach! Yuck! When he got off of the bed another group of people came to sit on it, they enjoyed it and had a good time!!  The cockroach was the only thing that docked it down to four starts.  

The drinks tasted good and were inexpensive. 

Also-the porn is kind of funny!  It is fun to go with people who are not expecting the porn and watching their reactions to it.
author: Erin D.

description:
I came here for a 70's theme bday party...it was fun times..

The next day I was reviewing all the photos taken...and found several of them with hilarious porn in the backdrop (on TV)...those photos never made it onto Facebook...

Note: I came here for a private party..so not sure what the vibe is really like on a regular night...
author: Mimi T.

description:
Long story short, I parked my car in front of Kozy Kar and I left my keys outside the car. At 2:30 am it was returned by the security guard Scott who was waiting for whoever would go back to the car to return the keys.

I was extremely thankful and offered him $ as a reward and he wouldn't accept. Said it was the right and honest thing to do. 

Sometimes people give reviews based how they like they place, i'm giving 5 stars because of the character and integrity of a person that works there.
author: Steven C.

description:
I pretty only go here because I love the staff. I've known these guys for a while now and they are just awesome!
Personally I think this place needs some upgrades and a really good deep cleaning. Carpet in a bar just always seems to leave this unpleasent smell behind no matter what you do. The curtain aka door for the womens stalls are horrible i this constant fear that someone is just open the curtain on me as I'm trying to pee, i mean that might make it easier i'd just pee anyway out of someone opening the curtain on me.
i know that porn is a focus of this place but i feel like it is more of a strip club with out the strippers unless you so happen to be there on a night where a drunk girl thinks that she has the skills enought to go up there.
author: Cescilia A.

description:
Still not exactly 100% positive on how I feel about this place. 

The only reason I say this is because of immense amount of porn. I love the idea of scrap fashion and i love that you can sit in a hot tub with a fur lines crawling all while enjoying some delicious drinks but the PORN! I'm not sure if I love the idea of watching a girl get chummed on while I'm with a group of friends. Also the floor is covered in center folds. The one drink I did have was delicious and the bartender was nice so that is definitely a plus! I think this place holds a different experience for everyone and I'm sure once it gets buzzing you forget all about the porn. Just I'm having a hard time understanding it all. Maybe I'm just a noob who knows.
author: Jacqueline C.

description:
The drinks are fine, the patrons are funny and the movies interspersed with porn is entertaining. But the smell is a little bit gross. More than a little bit if you get into the hot tub. 

The bathroom lines are fine too, but you can fit two people in the men's. So best get in there.
author: Trace D.

description:
I had no idea what I was getting myself into when I went here. The drinks are very very overpriced for what they are, but I got the impression people come here for the funky ambiance. The bar tender was pretty cool. The bouncer reminded me of my boyfriends dad. Weird. 

This place makes me chuckle. In the bathroom someone wrote, "be a sport, fuck the barback". There are waterbeds, faux fur, hilarious porn and cartoons on every screen on all walls, disco balls, and gave off creeper van vibes because of the van pieces. Everything seemed very clean and well kept.

Wonder what it would be like to go here on a first date. Could learn a lot about someone here.
author: Sophia G.

description: cool spot, the drinks are good and the bartenders are friendly. They could step up their porn on the TV though, all screens were playing the same video.... come on give your girl some variety!
author: Ashley K.

description: My boyfriend and I were visiting and decided to meet some friends for drinks. They immediately suggested Kozy Kar, and insisted we would be shocked once we got there. It was such a good time! A must go to!!
author: Alexis M.

description:
October 2010:  Kozy Kar was the site of me and my friend's last act in San Francisco, before I moved to New York and she moved to London.  We were Polk St. junkies, and there was no way we were going to deviate from that for our going away party.

Yes, me being the legendary mouth of the South chose a place that was nothing too fancy or extravagant, but someplace that allowed us to be sloppy.  It was one of those places that gave us an open checkbook to act any way we wanted.  In this instance, that's all we were asking for....because it's our party!

Kozy Kar gave us the whole back part of the bar and all the tables in the back.  This was pretty much no hassle, no cost.  Super spacious for our group of ~40-50 friends that stopped by throughout the night.  The ambiance of cheap beer and porno was what we were aiming for too.

The music honestly wasn't all that great, but I saw that as a blessing for this night, because usually I'll get in a non-stop jigg mood if good music comes on.  That meant I actually had to make the rounds and talk to people.

The bouncers were no hassle and were great.  We held a themed party "Places".  Dress up as something from a place.  I had a friend who made an amazing costume, a red phone booth from London (see pictures).  The thing was pretty much life sized, and she had no problem bringing it into the bar.  

Kozy Kar, a great way to be sent out, Polk St style.
author: Kyle W.

description: Cheap beer ($3 PBR and Olympia cans), great staff, lot's of cool regulars, and the campy decor make Kozy Kar a must if you're on Polk. You can even hang out on one of the water beds if you want. Also, every newcomer likes to point out the porn. Lots of porn throughout the bar and on the TV in between old nostalgia clips of cartoons and movies.
author: Ryan H.

description: Favorite bar in SF. Great vibe. Diverse crowd. Affordable drinks. Loud music. Fun times.
author: John G.

description: Not at all for the faint of heart, conservative, or radical feminist types...lol they have porn streaming while everyone boozes and schmoozes. The decor inspires images of 1970's summer movies and "innocence lost in the back seat". Lol seating is minimal but the place is built like a raunchy Dave and Busters and while I am a radical feminist type....I was amused to say the least :)
author: Autumn A.

description:
My friend from LA was in town visiting so I asked some of my friends what would be a fun place to take her on Polk Street... hands down KOZY KAR!!!

This place is awesome! Total dive bar, lots of porno pics, 70's retro theme, and porn playing on the TV's.
My friend from LA called it "the porn bar" and said it was really funky and fun!
We had a great time. The bartenders were fabulous and know how to make a drink. I recommend this place for a casual night out on Polk street.
author: Angela I.

description:
I was very excited to go to Kozy Kar. I had heard some pretty mixed reviews, but I was confident Kozy Kar would be amazing since I have been up and down Polk Street and hadn't had a bad experience.
The porn flashing on the televisions was the best part.
The bartenders were not helpful, drinks were overpriced, and you left the bar feeling as though you contracted a disease.

I understand the theme and where they were going with it, but would it hurt to clean your bar every once in a while?
author: Nicole S.

description:
I'm being stalked and harassed by the psychotic owner. 

I made the mistake once of sending him an email suggesting he should stop harassing a woman that left him a bad yelp review and got the full brunt of his venom and bile. 

I didn't mind, I'm glad that I stood up for her and took some of the pressure off. I will always stand up to bullies and abusers of women but it's been  years now and he still sends me disturbing emails. I've moved on but he's obsessed with me. 

The bar is disgusting I hang out in dive bars regularly and with the exception of Pop's on 24th this is the filthiest place I've been to outside of a third world country.

The staff is rude but I guess when the owner is a whack job he isn't going to be able to keep the first rate employees

The drinks are over the top expensive, even the $3 beers are $1 more than they are everywhere else selling crappy beer in a can.

The customers are the most horrid cologne wearing popped collar frat types you are going to find outside of The Marina

I guess the obvious question is why I'm updating my review if I want to be done with this. I want people to know what kind of person they are enriching by patronizing this bar. Also he just sent me a new batch of emails and I'm starting to get a little freaked out. I need this all to be documented and if I disappear please look in the Kozy Kar basement first.
author: Manny F.

description:
Wow. Could I have any diet coke with my rum and diet, please?? Ha ha 

I am not one to usually complain about a drink being strong. But wow. That was basically pure rum and it wasn't even that pricey either. Gotta love smaller themed bars with no cover and strong drinks! Really strong ha

This place Kozy Kar is decorated like stereotypical cars from the 60s and 70s. There are old car seats and things set up for people to sit in, pictures of old pin up girls hung everywhere, and they even managed to use pin up girl pictures and things like that in their flooring too. Pretty nuts. 

Also beware for the porn on the tvs if you don't like seeing it ha. They only play around 30 second clips, but you definitely may have something catch your eye a few times in your peripheral vision!

There is a small dance floor area here if you want to get your groove on a little bit, but if you eventually have to pee and you are a girl, beware that I guess they are too cheap here to have doors, so they have curtains instead....Flimsy curtains that cover the stall which has a mirror on the back wall so people can basically see you if they are peering in around the curtain to see if the stall is taken! So weird!
author: Sarah G.

description: Ed was seriously the best bartender I've evet met in my entire life, incredibly honestly, helpful, funny. He's the only reason I'd ever come back to this bar. Thanks mate!!
author: Ray K.

description:
I'm not sure how I ended up at Kozy Kar during a typical night out on Polk Street (pizza, making best friends with my cab driver, getting humped at McTeague's while waiting for the bathroom), but all of the sudden there I was seated in an old hot-tub staring at a screen while money shots of the porn variety punctuated a more milder cartoon movie.  

The various TV screens around Kozy Kar feature this unique interruption and besides halting the conversation, also make for an excellent drinking game.  

The bartenders were genuinely the nicest and friendliest I have come across in San Francisco.  It might have something to do with the magazine cut-outs of naked women all over the bar, walls and ceiling, but I was both surprised and pleased at their kindness.    

I recommend starting a night here, you'll have your choice of seating in a hot tub, or water bed, not to mention cheap drinks and be privy to the bartender's charm.  Kozy Kar has character and scrotum shots.  You can't lose.
author: Allyson D.

description: I mean what can you really say about this bar that hasn't been said already? It is the trashiest and sleaziest dive bar ever and it is pretty awesome. I wouldn't change a thing about it.
author: Randall P.

description:
Here's what you need to know:

1. There are pictures of breasts EVERYWHERE. On the walls, on the ceiling, on the television. You think they're just playing a western and then BAM! porn. Get ready.

2. There's a waterbed booth. Sounds cool, but it's not great when everyone has a drink that's spilling on you. Avoid.

3. There's an empty hot tub booth. Better than the waterbed.

4. The place is pretty dirty (literally and metaphorically), but drinks are cheap and the place always seems to be crowded. This would be a good place to go after you've already had a drink or five. No sooner.
author: Kate B.

description: Positive experience when it comes to the Playboy Playmate pictures on the wall and porn on the TV. 70's vibe is also cool. Negative experience when it comes to the crowd, which was entirely homosexual and lesbian. Not that being homosexual or lesbian is bad, just not my thing. Enjoy it if you like an alternative crowd.
author: Henry J.

description:
I had been here a while ago. They mostly had some canned beer that none in my party liked; I can't say for sure since I am not a beer person myself. They had no cocktails when I asked so it wasn't the right place for me. 

The decor is cheesy but I am guessing that was the intention. The oft-mentioned stripper's pole is over hyped. It's so close to the wall that only a petite waif would be able to do anything with it. Everyone else will get stuck. 

The toilets, as mentioned by many others, were not the prettiest sight. It was tiny -- one stall and maybe one (or two) urinals with no partition; please, spare me the sight of the guy peeing next to me! 

Am I coming back? No thanks!
author: Umesh T.

description:
Replace Matty with Sam, the man. And check out their awesomely non-sensical billboards outside. Beware catty Marina girls and boys looking for amateur hour fun and please don't let me make out with a little Indian posse or Mexican with a ponytail. Because everyone is generous with shots. Find me double fisting and possibly insulting you and getting you to buy me and my friends shots of Jam-o at the same time. And if someone offers you a drink, doesn't provide it, then smacks you on the ass and puts his dick on you, do not make the same mistake I did by not smacking him straight across his ugly face. 

Thanks boys! Love you lots.
author: Marina M.

description: This place was very cool.  I felt like I was in a  old school car kicking it with some punk rockers.  The decor had porn, pieces of old school cars, pin ups, & old games.  Very entertaining to just have drinks and look around. Bar tenders were awesome! So happy my fiancé and I stumbled upon this place as we will definitely be coming back!
author: Justine G.

description: I'm still learning to appreciate dive bars, but this is one that we all can appreciate. I will be coming back with a group sometime soon, to take advantage of the awesome looking booths and waterbed situation. Very entertaining atmosphere! Went on a weeknight and it was very low key. Heard it can be douchey on the weekends.
author: Lisa M.

description: This is a dive bar equipped with unique coves to sit in and with lots of TV around that intermittently play pornographic material. This is basically what Kozy Kar is. The drinks are dive bar priced and it can get crowded on weekends. What else is there to say about this SF joint? I guess keep your eyes on the TVs for a surprise!
author: Marlon T.

description:
Dive bar meets porn hub.

Imagine watching some random 80's show on the teli then all of a sudden girl gets jizzed on in the eye. Whatever, no big deal. 

This is the type of environment you'll be encountering at Kozy Kar. I frequent this bar a lot just because it's in a pretty good location on Polk and always seems to have space for a big group.

My favorite part is hopping into the waterbed in back and shooting the shit with friends. Did I just get some kinda disease through my open cut while sitting on the waterbed? Maybe. Whatever, no big deal. Tis the magic of Kozy Kar.
author: Paul B.

description: Best dive bar in SF! Hot tubs, water beds, a very unique experience. If you're looking for a unique local bar to take your friends here, definitely check out this place!
author: Matthew M.

description: Friendly bar tender and bouncer, interesting experience. Bartender makes a great mule
author: Ali D.

description:
I chose Kozy Kar for the first bar on my birthday bar crawl and it was a great choice! The bartender gifted me a birthday shot and a birthday drink which was SO nice! 

We all really wished we had been able to claim one of the awesome RV's but still had fun in our little area that we staked out. The Playboy-style prints on the floor in some areas and in the bathroom were pretty entertaining and the RV's really made for great bar decorations. 

The music was pretty good too and it usually didn't take too long to get a drink (especially when my friends just kept continuously bringing them to me! ;) ) I'd love to come back very early (or during the day) sometime to enjoy one of the fun RV's!
author: Meghan P.

description: This bar is cool mostly because it is unique.  I can get down with a place that thinks outside the box.  If you like bars, and you like porn, this is for you.  The entire joint is purposefully tacky, adorned with pornographic images circa 1980.  This sticky spot isn't somewhere that I'd go to leisurely grab a drink on a Friday night, but it's a great place to take visitors and first-timers solely to experience their reaction.  Everything feels and looks dirty and germ-y, so it's best to go late night after you're already liquored up and your inhibitions are low.
author: Kristen F.

description:
Some highlights for me of Kozy Kar:

1. Waterbed seats
2. Atari games
3. Boxes of wine (and they aren't afraid to make that into a wine spritzer if you're feeling as classy as I was)
4. Porn pictures on the floors

Do I really need to say any more?
author: Tiffany N.

description:
Great neighborhood dive bar with lots of vintage/interesting memorabilia to look at! Loved it! OK, I could have done without the 2 seconds of porn they squeeze in on the televisions but obviously our boyfriends loved it because they were plastered to the TVs. 

The bartender - Brian? - completely rocked! The Red Headed Sluts - alcoholic slurpy shots - were super tasty! 

I love the originality of the place: one booth was an old hot tub and another booth was made out of a Chevy truck. They played old 70's and 80's music - who doesn't love that? 

Can't wait to come back!
author: LuLu M.

description:
Now, the concept of this bar is awesome, but this bar is the exact reason people from out of town think SF is full of STI's and AIDS.

I almost didn't want to walk in here (but I'm not one to turn down a drink) as the bouncer checked my ID the smell of urine from the inside filled my sense of smell. 

Went in, ordered cocktails, sat at the hot tub. (Yes, the smell of urine still present).  Sitting at the hot tub really makes you want it to be filled with water...well, clean water anyway....and then....

Then I realize the screens are playing a porn film and blow job girl is going hard at it. It gets interrupted by advertising, back to blowjob girl...so what does our conversation turn into? Anal sex and blow jobs and anything sex.

Good times in San Francisco. Once we walked outside I don't know that the smell of Polk was any better than the bar. You gotta love San Francisco!
author: Alexia R.

description: This place is awesome incarnate. Yes, I spent over ten dollars on the pinball machine, and I cavorted on waterbeds. The service was stellar. The patrons were great. However, this review boils down to the fact that they kept my SOAD hoodie safe.
